name: Rivers of Rain
description:
1.- Story
Rivers of Rain is the story of a little girl destined to find her place in the world after the death of her mother, who leaves her love for life, the bond with family, the enjoyment of nature and being happy. with the essentials.
The Mother left her last wish in the hands of her daughter, to know the sea and to live this adventure, she is a little girl, she will travel with her maternal grandfather, through the places of the Maule. It is an emotional and spiritual journey, which leads us to reflect on the legacy that is left after death.



2.- A trip of a girl and hers grandfather
The grandfather begins his relationship with his granddaughter after the death of the girl's mother and as the game progresses the relationship between them deepens. Alternating between the grandfather and the girl, you must help them complete their journey through different parts of the Maule Region in Chile. The grandfather represents wisdom, strength, he is a traveling companion, but also a teacher. The girl is a character with an essential deep world view, a beautiful understanding of death and a spiritual bond with her mother through remembering her is observed.



3.- The beautiful Maule Region, Chile
Chile is a long and narrow country in South America. It is the southernmost country in the world, having in the north the phenomenon of the flowery desert and is, towards the south, the country closest to Antarctica. The most incredible thing about Chile is that in the east of the country it has giant snow-capped mountains that together are known as the Cordillera de los Andes, while to the west the country borders the sea, being possible to travel from the snow to the sea.
El Maule is the VII region of Chile, it is an important wine-growing region in the central zone. It is crossed by the Maule River, which flows west from the Andes through the huge lake called Colbún, it has beautiful natural landscapes and its capital is the city of Talca.



4. From reality to interactive art
Ríos de Lluvia is based on the landscapes of southern Chile. The artist Alberto Lemus took the fundamental details of nature, animal and plant, capturing the reality of the remote landscapes of the Maule region. In addition, together with museums and other history experts, digitized and stylized elements of the prehistory and history of the region are integrated, generating an unforgettable travel experience that leads us to reflect on reality, the passage of time, courage and the Family love.



5. The music of the nature trip
The music was created by the composer Begoña A. Carrasco. The central motif is a soundtrack that blends with the sounds of nature through harmonies and calming melodies that invite exploration. On the other hand, the sounds of birds, animals, wind and water are perceived with subtlety and fluidity as we travel along the Maule Region with the protagonists.
